characteristics.name: Description
characteristics.value: If this model is reduced to 0 wounds, before removing it from the battlefield and before any embarked models disembark, its vortex missiles explode. Each unit within 2D6" suffers D6 mortal wounds. If a model is wounded but not slain by in this manner roll another dice; on a 6, the model is sucked up into the swirling vortex and slain.
